member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Exif.ExifPropertyItem.PrettyPrintValue
member.summary: Get the Pretty Print Value.
member.remarks:
The pretty print value is determined by ValueOptions that may exist in the PhotoTagMetadata's XML data.
For example the Flash tag property (Id=37385) provides options for raw data that transforms the value 1 to the pretty print value, "Flash fired".

member.name: T:PhotoLibrary.Util.ImageFast

member.exception: is thrown if the destFileName can't be created.

member.param: The path to save the file to, which can specify a different filename.

member.summary: Used by the contructors to initialize a new photo

member.summary: Loads the ExifPropertyItems for the Image.

member.summary: Sets the specified property item from this object.
member.param: The of the property item to get.
The value to set the to

member.name: M:PhotoLibrary.Photo.GetExifPropertyItem(PhotoLibrary.Exif.ExifPropertyName)
member.summary: Gets the specified property item from this object.
member.param: The of the property item to get.
member.remarks: Since the value is returned as an object, it must be cast to it's native Type.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExifPropertyItemCollection
member.summary: Gets the for the Photo. You can get any using either the ID or using .
member.remarks: Items in this collection are read-only.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ImageWidth
member.summary: Gets the number of columns of image data, equal to the number of pixels per row.
member.remarks: In JPEG compressed data a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ImageLength
member.summary: Gets the number of rows of image data.
member.remarks: In JPEG compressed data a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.BitsPerSample
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per image component.
member.remarks: In this standard each component of the image is 8 bits, so the value for this tag is 8. See also . In JPEG compressed data a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Compression
member.summary: Gets the compression scheme used for the image data.
member.remarks: When a primary image is JPEG compressed, this designation is not necessary and is omitted. When thumbnails use JPEG compression, this tag value is set to 6.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.PhotometricInterpretation
member.summary: Gets the pixel composition.
member.remarks: In JPEG compressed data a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the image as .
member.remarks: This property only exists on Digital Still Cameras that support Orientation.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SamplesPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the number of components per pixel.
member.remarks: Since this standard applies to RGB and YCbCr images, the value set for this tag is 3. In JPEG compressed data a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.PlanarConfiguration
member.summary: Gets value indicating whether pixel components are recorded in chunky or planar format.
member.remarks: In JPEG compressed files a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag. If this field does not exist, the TIFF default of 1 (chunky) is assumed.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.YCbCrSubSampling
member.summary: Gets the sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.
member.remarks: In JPEG compressed data a JPEG marker is used instead of this tag.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.YCbCrPositioning
member.summary: Gets the position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.
member.remarks: This field is designated only for JPEG compressed data or uncompressed YCbCr data. The TIFF default is 1 (centered); but when Y:Cb:Cr = 4:2:2 it is recommended in this standard that 2 (co-sited) be used to record data, in order to improve the image quality when viewed on TV systems. When this field does not exist, the reader shall assume the TIFF default. In the case of Y:Cb:Cr = 4:2:0, the TIFF default (centered) is recommended. If the reader does not have the capability of supporting both kinds of YCbCrPositioning, it shall follow the TIFF default regardless of the value in this field. It is preferable that readers be able to support both centered and co-sited positioning.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.XResolution
member.summary: Gets the number of pixels per in the direction.
member.remarks: When the image resolution is unknown, 72 [dpi] is designated.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.YResolution
member.summary: Gets the number of pixels per in the direction. The same value as is designated.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ResolutionUnit
member.summary: Gets the unit for measuring and .
member.remarks: The same unit is used for both and . If the image resolution in unknown, 2 (inches) is designated.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.StripOffsets
member.summary: Gets the byte offset of that strip for each strip.
member.remarks: It is recommended that this be selected so the number of strip bytes does not exceed 64 Kbytes. With JPEG compressed data this designation is not needed and is omitted. See also and .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.RowsPerStrip
member.summary: Gets the number of rows per strip.
member.remarks: This is the number of rows in the image of one strip when an image is divided into strips. With JPEG compressed data this designation is not needed and is omitted. See also and .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.StripByteCounts
member.summary: Gets the total number of bytes in each strip.
member.remarks: With JPEG compressed data this designation is not needed and is omitted.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.JPEGInterchangeFormat
member.summary: Gets the offset to the start byte (SOI) of JPEG compressed thumbnail data.
member.remarks: This is not used for primary image JPEG data.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.JPEGInterchangeFormatLength
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes of JPEG compressed thumbnail data.
member.remarks: This is not used for primary image JPEG data. JPEG thumbnails are not divided but are recorded as a continuous JPEG bitstream from SOI to EOI. APPn and COM markers should not be recorded. Compressed thumbnails shall be recorded in no more than 64 Kbytes, including all other data to be recorded in APP1.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.TransferFunction
member.summary: Gets a transfer function for the image, described in tabular style.
member.remarks: Normally this tag is not necessary, since color space is specified in the color space information tag (ColorSpace).

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.WhitePoint
member.summary: The chromaticity of the white point of the image.
member.remarks: Normally this tag is not necessary, since color space is specified in the property.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.PrimaryChromaticities
member.summary: Gets the chromaticity of the three primary colors of the image.
member.remarks: Normally this tag is not necessary, since color space is specified in the information property.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.YCbCrCoefficients
member.summary: Gets the matrix coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ReferenceBlackWhite
member.summary: Gets the reference black point value and reference white point value.

remarks.para: No defaults are given in TIFF, but the values below are given as defaults here. The color space is declared in a color space information tag, with the default being the value that gives the optimal image characteristics Interoperability these conditions.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.DateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time of image creation. In this standard it is the date and time the file was changed.
member.remarks: The EXIF format is "YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS" with time shown in 24-hour format, and the date and time separated by one blank character. When the date and time are unknown, all the character spaces except colons (":") may be filled with blank characters, or else the Interoperability field may be filled with blank characters. When the field is left blank, it is treated as unknown.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ImageDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets a character string giving the title of the image.
member.remarks: Two-byte character codes cannot be used. When a 2-byte code is necessary, the Exif Private tag is to be used.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Make
member.summary: Gets the manufacturer of the recording equipment.

remarks.para: This is the manufacturer of the DSC, scanner, video digitizer or other equipment that generated the image.
When the field is left blank, it is treated as unknown.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Model
member.summary: Gets the model name or model number of the equipment.

remarks.para: This is the model name of number of the DSC, scanner, video digitizer or other equipment that generated the image.
When the field is left blank, it is treated as unknown.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Software
member.summary: Gets the name and version of the software or firmware of the camera or image input device used to generate the image.
member.remarks: When the field is left blank, it is treated as unknown. The detailed format is not specified.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Artist
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the camera owner, photographer or image creator. The detailed format is not specified.
member.remarks: When the field is left blank, it is treated as unknown.
member.example: Camera owner, John Smith; Photographer, Michael Brown; Image creator, Ken James

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Copyright
member.summary: Gets or sets the copyright information.
member.remarks:
The property is used to indicate both the photographer and editor copyrights. It is the copyright notice of the person or organization claiming rights to the image.
The Interoperability copyrights statement including date and rights should be written in this field. "Copyright, John Smith, 19xx. All rights reserved." When the field is left blank, it is treated as unknown.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExifVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the EXIF standard supported.
member.remarks: Conformance to this standard is indicated by recording "0220" as 4-byte ASCII. Nonexistence of this property is taken to mean nonconformance to the EXIF standard.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FlashPixVersion
member.summary: Gets the Flashpix format version supported by a FPXR file.
member.remarks: If the FPXR function supports Flashpix format Ver. 1.0, this is indicated similarly to ExifVersion by recording "0100".

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ColorSpace
member.summary: Gets the color space information.
member.remarks: Normally sRGB (=1) is used to define the color space based on the PC monitor conditions and environment. If a color space other than sRGB is used, Uncalibrated is set. Image data recorded as Uncalibrated can be treated as sRGB when it is converted to Flashpix.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.PixelXDimension
member.summary: Gets the valid width of the compressed image.
member.remarks: This property should not exist in an uncompressed file.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.PixelYDimension
member.summary: Gets the valid height of the compressed image.
member.remarks: This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file. Since data padding is unnecessary in the vertical direction, the number of lines recorded in this valid image height tag will in fact be the same as that recorded in the SOF.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ComponentsConfiguration
member.summary: Gets the color channels of each component.
member.remarks: Data is arranged in order from the 1st component to the 4th. For uncompressed data the data arrangement is given in the property. However, since can only express the order of Y,Cb and Cr, this tag is provided for cases when compressed data uses components other than Y, Cb, and Cr and to enable support of other sequences.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.CompressedBitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the compression mode used for a compressed image indicated in unit bits per pixel.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.MakerNote
member.summary: Gets a property for manufacturers of Exif writers to record any desired information.
member.remarks: The contents are up to the manufacturer, but this property should not be used for any other than its intended purpose.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.UserComment
member.summary: Gets or sets keywords or comments on the image besides those in , and without the character code limitations of the property.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.RelatedSoundFile
member.summary: Gets the name of an audio file related to the image data.

remarks.para: The only relational information recorded here is the Exif audio file name and extension (an ASCII string consisting of 8 characters + '.' + 3 characters). The path is not recorded.

When using this tag, audio files shall be recorded in conformance to the Exif audio format. Writers are also allowed to store the data such as Audio within APP2 as Flashpix extension stream data. Audio files shall be recorded in conformance to the Exif audio format.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.DateTimeOriginal
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the original image data was generated. For a DSC the date and time the picture was taken are recorded.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.DateTimeDigitized
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the image was stored as digital data.
member.remarks: If, for example, an image was captured by DSC and at the same time the file was recorded, then the and will have the same contents.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubsecTime
member.summary: Gets the fractions of seconds for .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubsecTimeOriginal
member.summary: Gets the fractions of seconds for .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubsecTimeDigitized
member.summary: Gets the fractions of seconds for .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExposureTime
member.summary: Gets the exposure time, given in seconds.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FNumber
member.summary: Gets the F number.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExposureProgram
member.summary: Gets the class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SpectralSensitivity
member.summary: Gets the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used.
member.remarks: The tag value is an ASCII string compatible with the standard developed by the ASTM Technical committee.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ISOSpeedRatings
member.summary: Gets the ISO Speed and ISO Latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.OECF
member.summary: Gets the Opto-Electric Conversion Function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524.
member.remarks: OECF is the relationship between the camera optical input and the image values.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ShutterSpeedValue
member.summary: Gets the shutter speed.
member.remarks: The unit is the APEX (Additive System of Photographic Exposure) setting.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ApertureValue
member.summary: Gets the lens aperture.
member.remarks: The unit is the APEX value.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.BrightnessValue
member.summary: Gets the value of brightness.

remarks.para: The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of -99.99 to 99.99.
If the numerator of the recorded value is -1, Unknown shall be indicated.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExposureBiasValue
member.summary: Gets the exposure bias.
member.remarks: The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of –99.99 to 99.99.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.MaxApertureValue
member.summary: Gets the smallest F number of the lens.
member.remarks: The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of 00.00 tO 99.99, but it is not limited to this range.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubjectDistance
member.summary: Gets the distance to the subject, given in meters.
member.remarks: Note that if the numerator of the recorded value is -1, Infinity shall be indicated; and if the numerator is 0, Distance unknown shall be indicated.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.MeteringMode
member.summary: Gets the metering mode.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.LightSource
member.summary: Gets the kind of light source.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Flash
member.summary: Gets the status of flash when the image was shot.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubjectArea
member.summary: Gets the location and area of the main subject in the overall scene.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FocalLength
member.summary: Gets the actual focal length of the lens, in mm.
member.remarks: Conversion is not made to the focal length of a 35 mm film camera.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FlashEnergy
member.summary: Gets the strobe energy at the time the image is captured, as measured in Beam Candle Power Seconds (BCPS).

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SpatialFrequencyResponse
member.summary: Gets the camera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the direction of image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FocalPlaneXResolution
member.summary: Gets the number of pixels in the image width (X) direction per on the camera focal plane.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FocalPlaneYResolution
member.summary: Gets the number of pixels in the image height (Y) direction per on the camera focal plane.
member.remarks: The unit is specified in .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
member.summary: Gets the number of pixels in the image height (y) direction per unit on the camera focal plane.
member.remarks: The unit is specified in .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubjectLocation
member.summary: Gets the location of the main subject in the scene.

remarks.para: The value of this property represents the pixel at the center of the main subject relative to the left edge, prior to rotation processing as per the Rotation tag. The first value indicates the X column number and second indicates the Y row number.
When a camera records the main subject location, it is recommended that the be used instead of this property.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExposureIndex
member.summary: Gets the exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image is captured.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SensingMethod
member.summary: Gets the image sensor type on the camera or input device.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FileSource
member.summary: Gets the image source.
member.remarks: If a DSC recorded the image, this tag value of this tag always be set to FileSource.DSC, indicating that the image was recorded on a DSC.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SceneType
member.summary: Gets the type of scene.
member.remarks: If a DSC recorded the image, this tag value shall always be set to , indicating that the image was directly photographed.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.CFAPattern
member.summary: Gets the color filter array (CFA) geometric pattern of the image sensor when a one-chip color area sensor is used.
member.remarks: It does not apply to all sensing methods.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.CustomRendered
member.summary: Gets the renderer used for special processing on image data, such as rendering geared to output.
member.remarks: When special processing is performed, the reader is expected to disable or minimize any further processing.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ExposureMode
member.summary: Gets the exposure mode set when the image was shot.
member.remarks: In auto-bracketing mode, the camera shoots a series of frames of the same scene at different exposure settings.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.WhiteBalance
member.summary: Gets the white balance mode set when the image was shot.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.DigitalZoomRatio
member.summary: Gets the digital zoom ratio when the image was shot.
member.remarks: If the numerator of the recorded value is 0, this indicates that digital zoom was not used.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.FocalLengthIn35mmFilm
member.summary: Gets the equivalent focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in mm.
member.remarks: A value of 0 means the focal length is unknown. Note that this tag differs from .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SceneCaptureType
member.summary: Gets the type of scene that was shot.
member.remarks: It can also be used to record the mode in which the image was shot. Note that this differs from .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.GainControl
member.summary: Gets the degree of overall image gain adjustment.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Contrast
member.summary: Gets the direction of contrast processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Saturation
member.summary: Gets the direction of saturation processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Sharpness
member.summary: Gets the direction of sharpness processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.DeviceSettingDescription
member.summary: Gets the information on the picture-taking conditions of a particular camera model. The tag is used only to indicate the picture-taking conditions in the reader.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.SubjectDistanceRange
member.summary: Gets the distance to the subject.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.ImageUniqueID
member.summary: Gets a unique identifier assigned to each image.
member.remarks: It is recorded as an ASCII string equivalent to hexadecimal notation and 128-bit fixed length.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.InteroperabilityIndex
member.summary: Gets the identification of the Interoperability rule.
member.remarks: If this property exists, it is removed when the Photo is saved.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.InteroperabilityVersion
member.summary: Gets the interoperability version.
member.remarks: If this property exists, it is removed when the Photo is saved.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.RelatedImageWidth
member.summary: Gets the image width.
member.remarks: This property represents the image width when it was digitized. If the image is rotated it will not changed.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.RelatedImageLength
member.summary: Gets the image length.
member.remarks: This property represents the image width when it was digitized. If the image is rotated it will not changed.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Thumbnail
member.summary: Gets or sets thumbnail stored in the photo.

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Width
member.summary: Gets the of the .

member.name: P:PhotoLibrary.Photo.Height
member.summary: Gets the of the .

member.name: T:PhotoLibrary.Photo.AnchorPosition
member.summary: Determines where cropping starts when using .

member.name: F:PhotoLibrary.Photo.AnchorPosition.Top
member.summary: Crop starting at Top of .

member.name: F:PhotoLibrary.Photo.AnchorPosition.Center
member.summary: Crop starting at Center of .

member.name: F:PhotoLibrary.Photo.AnchorPosition.Bottom
member.summary: Crop starting at Bottom of .

member.name: F:PhotoLibrary.Photo.AnchorPosition.Left
member.summary: Crop starting at Left of .

member.name: F:PhotoLibrary.Photo.AnchorPosition.Right
member.summary: Crop starting at Right of .
